partnerDetails.about:
Amics is one of the main Swiss suppliers of automation solutions dedicated to the environment, production and distribution of energy. Its experience and numerous references in the fields of water treatment, thermal processes and distribution networks confirm its position in the segment of turnkey solutions for the automation of treatment and production units

Crafts:

• Automating
• Supervision
• Software Solutions
• After Sales Service

Activity Area:

• Water Treatment
• Waste recovery
• Thermal Power Station
• Energy Distribution Network

Solutions for:

• Power Distribution Networks
• Recovery of waste
• Power Stations
• Treatment of water
